articles.author: Dipayan Mitra
articles.title: Bitcoin breaks $60k: Will $88k by September be the next BTC milestone? - AMBCrypto News
articles.description: A bullish pattern appeared on Bitcoin’s chart, suggesting that it might reach new highs by September.
articles.content:
• BTCs price increased by more than 3% in the last 24 hours. 
  • Most metrics and indicators were bullish on the coin. 
Bitcoin [BTC] has, after several weeks, shown signs of reco… [+2394 chars]
